stories.text:
Here's another batch of S21 startups for you all. The previous thread was https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28209928. The original description is at https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27877280.

There are 6 startups in this thread. The initial order is random:

AlgoUniversity (YC S21) - Job-driven virtual education hub for engineering students - https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28233917

Enerjazz (YC S21) - Battery swapping stations for EVs and e-rickshaws - https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28233919

Astek Diagnostics (YC S21) - Determine antibiotic treatment in one hour - https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28233918

DigiBuild (YC S21) - Construction software powered by blockchain - https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28233920

Karbon Card (YC S21) - Corporate credit cards for Indian Startups and SMBs - https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28233924

Sequin (YC S21) - Debit card that builds credit for women - https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28233922
stories.title: Launch YC S21: Meet the Batch, Thread #8

stories.text:
Prerequisite: if it's not pleasurable in your head right now, there is 3 possible reasons: your ego, the fear of death or both.

Let's examine some examples you'll find all over the internet.

Maybe you are physically sick. You can still be happy right? We all have experienced that before, being happy and sick at the same time. Maybe you've killed someone years ago and you're still suffering about it. You are suffering from your ego. You are suffering from the look of others (including yourself). Maybe you've lost someone and you're still suffering about it. You are suffering from the fear of death. And your ego. You want to control your environment and you don't feel whole. You dont have gratitude.

That prerequisite is well known and documented all over the internet and in books. The problem is: the proposed cures dont work. For some reasons we might understand later in the discussion, meditation for example will get you nowhere (or not very far). But the following might.

---------------------------

Ask yourself the following question once per day for 5 days: is it pleasurable in my head right now?

There is quite some subtleties at play here. Since this is HN, I'll be happy to discuss them with you.
stories.title: Show HN: Cure most of your suffering, in 1 minute per day for 5 days
